content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the box in this query description: "Printer on left, shelving on right, you want the back option of the two boxes". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The query specifies a printer on the left and shelving on the right, with the target being the back option of two boxes. In view 0, the printer is clearly visible on the left side, and there are two boxes near the shelving on the right. The back box is visible in this view, making it the clearest option to identify the target object.
